actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Designates the following members to the following committees: (1) the Honorable Ted Weiss, of New York, on the Committee on Foreign Affairs; and (2) the Honorable Brian J. Donnelly, of Massachusetts, on the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries (first session only) and the Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
